results.content: Above and beyond, Alex is a super hero, tech stack on point, delivery quality. Quick responses on the QA threads and also via his YouTube channel. Finally an instructor that supports his courses and doesn't leave students hanging without feedback on solutions to errors. I have so many courses and hardly ever leave a review unless I believe it to be outstanding content. Its fresh and off the editing press, get this course if you fancy a matrix style upgrade to your serverless knowledge.
